mapper.insert: insert into user_prefer (user_id, movie_id, score) values (#{user_id},#{movie_id},#{score})
insert into user_prefer (user_id, movie_id, score, schedule_id) values (#{user_id},#{movie_id},#{score},#{schedule_id})
mapper.update: update user_prefer set movie_id=#{movie_id}, schedule_id=#{schedule_id} where user_id=#{user_id} and schedule_id=#{prev_schedule}
update user_prefer set score = #{score} where user_id=#{user_id} and movie_id=#{movie_id}
mapper.select: select * from user_prefer where user_id=#{user_id} and score < 0

select score, user_prefer.user_id user_id, user_prefer.movie_id movie_id, schedule.schedule_id schedule_id, to_char(start_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as start_time, to_char(end_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as end_time from user_prefer, schedule where user_prefer.schedule_id = schedule.schedule_id and user_id=#{user_id}
